StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_CheckAIMExam]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MarineCandidateID int, @HasAIMExam char(1) OUTPUT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET @HasAIMExam = 'N'
IF EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 [SPECIAL_EXAM_DATE] FROM CANDIDATE_SPECIAL_EXAM WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateID) BEGIN SET @HasAIMExam = 'Y' END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
